remarks: g-linear property that will be used for inner product.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmapgln2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapgln2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapgln2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmapgln2.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
hdmapgln2.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
hdmapgln2.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmapgln2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hdmapgln2.q $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` R ) $.
hdmapgln2.m $e |- .X. = ( .r ` R ) $.
hdmapgln2.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapgln2.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapgln2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapgln2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmapgln2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hdmapgln2.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) $.
hdmapgln2.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
hdmapgln2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` ( ( A .x. Y ) .+ Z ) ) ` X ) = ( ( ( ( S ` Y ) ` X ) .X. ( G ` A ) ) .+^ ( ( S ` Z ) ` X ) ) ) $.
